ygData.subject: RE: Saving lots of moolah (was Verant vs Powergamers)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone - been enjoying your company for a couple weeks now :-)  Not only have I not spent money on video games...this was my second game, my first was
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone - been enjoying your company for a couple
weeks now :-) Not only have I not spent money on video games...this was my
second game, my first was buying Diablo used...I have not spent money
period! I have saved several hundred dollars, I am sure, on not going out
for drinks and dinner every night and movies and clubs on the weekend.

Funny thing is, I like the people I've met playing EQ better
than those I used to meet at bars so it's worked out better all around :-)

Tani
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach
[mailto:mroach@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 4:01 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Saving lots of
moolah (was Verant vs Powergamers)

From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>

<LOL> I absolutely agree as well. Have not
spent one iota of coin, err,
money on video games since April - and not
so much as a peek at new reviews,
except maybe to snoop around for info on the
new add-on.

- Faras "I want my EQ" Tar'Linedhel

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 4:33 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Verant vs
Powergamers OT (was Plane of losses)
>
>
> From: Moss <Olmoss@...>
>
>
> > One last thing, before EQ came out, I
averaged buying
> about 10 computer
> > games a year. A lot of them I would not
even finish
> because I got bored
> > with them. I've been playing EQ since
April and I am still
> having lots of
> > fun playing. As a 22d level bard, I
still have alot of
> things I can look
> > forward to doing in the game. I haven't
even considered
> buying a new game
> > since April.
>
> Well put !!!! I was just telling my wife
how much money she save
> because I have not brought the 3 or 4
games a month that I used to !
> Now I may but Diablo 2 but EQ I play every
day and the one game I
> brought since EQ (TA Kingdoms) I haven't
bothered to finish.
> But I will
> collect pop bottles on the side of the
road to get the EQ
> Expansion pack
> :) You can't beat playing with real folk
:)
>
> Bill, AKA Moonflower CZ-Thule
>
